title: Control
description: An Amazon Bestseller!Control is the third of four books in the Power Series based in the world of the sexy and powerful Sethi Brothers. It is the first part of a duet centered around Jai that ends in a cliffhanger. Book 4 will be needed to conclude the epic story.It's all mine now.Power. Money. Legacy.I've wanted this for as long as I can remember.I just didn't expect it to include ghosts from the past.They haunt me and everyone I care about--threatening to ruin us.My destiny seemed bleak, until Claire Varon.Fire disguised as ice. The devil with the face of an angel.Like the eye of a hurricane before the worst part of her storm has yet to strike.Her secrets push away anyone who dares to get close.But, I have secrets of my own, making me a worthy adversary against the impenetrable walls she's trapped herself within.The only thing we agree on is the need for control.What she doesn't know is that I always win.***Trigger Warning***Subject matters that may be too dark and disturbing to some readers are included in this book.
author: Victoria  Woods
